entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
